articles.author: Nadine El-Bawab and Daniel Amarante
articles.title: Over 90 million Americans on alert for snow, icy weather - ABC7 Chicago
articles.description: Over 90 million people are under winter weather alerts as a significant winter storm brings snow and ice.
articles.content:
Over 90 million people are under winter weather alerts from the Midwest to the Northeast, as a significant winter storm brings snow and ice this weekend.
Winter alerts are in effect for portions of … [+1457 chars]

articles.title: CBS News poll — Trump has positive approval amid "energetic" opening weeks; seen as doing what he promised - CBS News
articles.description: Trump's deportation plans are popular, but Americans say there's not enough focus on lowering prices.
articles.content: With most describing him as "tough," "energetic," "focused" and "effective" — and as doing what he'd promised during his campaign — President Trump has started his term with net positive marks from A… [+4242 chars]

articles.author: Eleanor Pringle
articles.title: Trump vows to tap America’s ‘liquid gold’ oil reserves and ‘drill baby, drill’—the only problem is, it’s not up to him - Fortune
articles.description: Analysts Matthew Bernstein of Rystad and Robert Clarke of WoodMac discuss the oil industry's reaction to Trump's plans.

articles.title: Trump’s assault on public health and the growing threat of an H5N1 bird flu pandemic - WSWS
articles.description: Over the past week, a series of developments have reaffirmed the imminent danger of an H5N1 “bird flu” pandemic, for which American and world capitalism are wholly unprepared.
articles.content:
